title: API Configuration
description: Sets up a GET endpoint at /ts/pets that returns a list of all pets in the system.

title: Getting All Pets
description: Fetches every pet from the store and prepares them to send back.

title: Success Response
description: Returns the complete list of pets with a 200 OK status.

title: Error Handling
description: Catches any unexpected problems and returns a 500 error if something goes wrong.
